tasks.label: Build and Run on Android Device
tasks.command: cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && adb install -r app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk && adb shell am start -n com.mchtapp/.MainActivity

tasks.label: Build and Install with New Icon
tasks.command: cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && adb uninstall com.mchtapp && adb install app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk && adb shell am start -n com.mchtapp/.MainActivity
